## Description
Complementary Metal–Oxide–Semiconductor(CMOS) consists&#10;&#9;&#9;of millions of pixel sensors, each of which includes a photodetector.

## Characteristics

| Attribute      | Value |
|--------:|:------|
|Mass:|0.05 kg|
|Type:|Electronic|
